title: Lesson 004: My Daily Phrase German - Enhanced Version
description: This is an enhanced version of lesson 4 including synchronised vocabulary flashcards which appear on your iPod or computer screen as you listen to the audio programme. This is provided as a sample of one part of the Premium Membership. More information can be found at our website.
